item.title: Report X-2024070116
item.description:
Report X-2024070116

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Loaded ethanol tank car UTLX 213167 was observed by a yard crew with liquid spilling from the around the manway during switching operations. The car was set out and a contractor called to investigate and remedy the leak. They found 6 of 8 manway swing bolts less than tool tight and signs of spillage around the manway. The manway was opened and a lid gasket was observed in good condition. The manway was closed and properly secured tool tight.

item.title: Report E-2024060053
item.description:
Report E-2024060053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-03T15:13:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-03
  • City: BOYKINS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: CSX TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 6/3/24, at 1232 hours, personnel in the NCVA Railroad Boykins, VA Yard discovered GBRX709256, a loaded tank car of Sodium Hydroxide Solution, had leaked from the top of the car. The car was isolated and the shipper, Chemserve Terminals, was notified via CHEMTREC 2024060300092. Hepaco, a CSXT emergency response contractor, was dispatched to the scene as well as a representative from Chemserve Terminals and found the air line valve open and secondary closure plug not installed. The issue was identified and corrective actions were communicated to the shipperâ€™s representative- Matt Law 757-544-0784. Contractor personnel closed the valve and reinstalled the plug and decontaminated the car. The leak was secured and the car was released for transport.
